DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate three doses of aripiprazole versus placebo in patients with an acute episode of schizophrenia
DOC.brief_title: Study of Three Doses of Aripiprazole in Patients With Acute Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Men and women, ages 18 and older, with a worsening of schizophrenia symptoms over the past three months
